member.name: D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_PIPELINE_STATE_CREATE_FLAGS.D3D12_GPU_BASED_VALIDATION_PIPELINE_STATE_CREATE_FLAG_NONE
member.summary: This is the default value. Indicates no patching of pipeline states should be done during PSO creation. Instead PSO’s are patched on first use in a command list. This can help to reduce the up-front cost of PSO creation but may instead slow down command list recording until a steady-state is reached.
